text: The 1954 Connecticut gubernatorial election was held on November 2, 1954. Democratic nominee Abraham Ribicoff narrowly defeated incumbent Republican John Davis Lodge with 49.50% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Abraham Ribicoff, Democratic *John Davis Lodge, Republican Other candidates *Jasper McLevy, Socialist ===Results=== ==References== 1954 Connecticut
title: 1954 Connecticut gubernatorial election
